snippet: Results of a clinical trial, disclosed at a medical meeting in Chicago, showed that patients given trametinib lived longer than those receiving chemotherapy for advanced stages of the cancer.
abstract: GlaxoSmithKline's new drug trametinib prolongs the lives of patients with advanced melanoma in a clinical trial, adding to two drugs that have already received regulatory approval.
lead_paragraph: Results of a clinical trial, disclosed at a medical meeting in Chicago, showed that patients given trametinib lived longer than those receiving chemotherapy for advanced stages of the cancer.

headline.seo: GlaxoSmithKline Melanoma Drug Prolongs Patients’ Lives
headline.main: A Drug for Advanced Melanoma Is Found to Prolong Patients’ Lives
headline.print_headline: A Drug for Advanced Melanoma Is Found to Prolong Patients’ Lives
